quest.name: Pass the Parcel
journal:
 Quest Sync
A flyer for attracting prospective employees catches your eye.
objectives: Express your /doubt to the Mord taskmaster.

dialogue.name: POSTER03366
dialogue.text: Onest paye foR onest woRk! No expeerRians ness ess haiRy!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: It appears to be a job advertisement. Speak with the Mord taskmaster for details.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: It appears to be a job advertisement, most likely written by the Mord taskmaster.

dialogue.name: MORDOYASHIGE03366
dialogue.text: Mmm... You'll do. Here for work, are we?

dialogue.name: MORDOYASHIGE03366
dialogue.text: Good, good! Honest pay for honest work, that's my motto!

dialogue.name: MORDOYASHIGE03366
dialogue.text: Your timing could not be better. I have a job for you.

dialogue.name: MORDOYASHIGE03366
dialogue.text: Take this package to my client, who is outside the village, to the south. Mord fellow, you will know him when you see him. Probably.

dialogue.name: MORDOYASHIGE03366
dialogue.text: Now, listen carefully. You must not peek inside, no matter what! Is that clear? Good. Now, off you go!

dialogue.name: MORDOYASHIGE03366
dialogue.text: You understood my instructions, yes? Then why are you still here?

dialogue.name: MORDSUSPICIOUS03366
dialogue.text: Ah, there is the parcel. Get herhim!

dialogue.name: MORDOYASHIGE03366
dialogue.text: You are back!? But that was not how─ Ahem! The client will ah...re-unpurse you, I mean, reimburse you. Now, be off!

dialogue.name: MORDSUSPICIOUS03366
dialogue.text: You were not supposed to fight back! Not fair, not fair!

dialogue.name: MORDSUSPICIOUS03366
dialogue.text: Our job was to steal the package, not to hurt anyone, I swear!

dialogue.name: MORDSUSPICIOUS03366
dialogue.text: Ask the taskmaster! Yes! He will tell you everything.

dialogue.name: MORDSUSPICIOUS03366
dialogue.text: Please, no more! No more!

dialogue.name: MORDOYASHIGE03366
dialogue.text: Is there a problem? Still looking for the client, are we?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: He seems to be hiding something. Use the doubt emote to wring the truth from him.

dialogue.name: MORDOYASHIGE03366
dialogue.text: No, stop! I can explain!

dialogue.name: MORDOYASHIGE03366
dialogue.text: The truth is, there is no client. And the package is full of nothing but rocks. Not expensive ones, either. Just rocks!

dialogue.name: MORDOYASHIGE03366
dialogue.text: I hire people to deliver the parcel and another group of thugs to steal it. When they return to me empty-handed, I demand compensation for the loss of my wares. No blood spilled, just coin changing hands, that is all!

dialogue.name: MORDSUSPICIOUS03366
dialogue.text: Please, boss, no more. This is too complicated, too dangerous!

dialogue.name: MORDOYASHIGE03366
dialogue.text: You are right. There must be easier ways to make money. We need something that requires less effort, less risk! Hmm...

dialogue.name: MORDOYASHIGE03366
dialogue.text: Ahem! Kind traveler, will you accept this as an apology? And maybe no one needs to know about this, yes?
